text: Mar Thoma may refer to: ==Community== *Saint Thomas Christians or Mar Thoma Christians or Nasrani people of Kerala. ==Institutions== *Malankara Mar Thoma Syrian Church also known as Mar Thoma Church ==People== *Mar Thoma I, first indigenous Metropolitan of Malankara *Mar Thoma II *Mar Thoma III *Mar Thoma IV *Mar Thoma V *Mar Thoma VI *Mar Thoma VII *Mar Thoma VIII *Mar Thoma IX *Mar Thoma X *Mar Thoma XI *Mar Thoma XII *Mar Thoma XIII *Mar Thoma XIV *Mar Thoma XV *Mar Thoma XVI *Mar Thoma XVII *Mar Thoma XVIII *Mar Thoma XIX *Mar Thoma XX *Mar Thoma XXI Category:Title and name disambiguation pages
title: Mar Thoma
